channel.title: Pages on Joseph Scheidt
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Joseph Scheidt

item.title: About
item.description: About I am a lifelong Seattle-area native with a passion for data science and data analysis. I enjoy reading and exploring how data impacts and can improve the various sectors of our society. When I’m not at work, studying, or implementing personal data projects, I enjoy playing soccer (badly) and bass (decently! But not as well as I used to). I’m currently working towards a Masters degree in Data Science from Johns Hopkins University.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Please feel free to email, LinkedIn message, or tweet at me for any reason using the information linked on the red buttons above. I’ll be excited to hear from you! Unless you are a spam bot phishing for my Facebook account login. Then I will be somewhat less excited.
